chain.name: doen doen planted kebap

plantedDishes.name: Doen Doen Dürüm
plantedDishes.description: Planted kebab in wrap with salad, red cabbage, red onions, parsley, tomatoes, cucumbers, grilled vegetables and four homemade sauces

plantedDishes.name: Doen Doen Teller
plantedDishes.description: Planted kebab plate with salad, red cabbage, red onions, parsley, tomatoes, cucumbers, grilled vegetables and four homemade sauces

plantedDishes.name: Doen Doen Yufka
plantedDishes.description: Planted kebab yufka with fresh ingredients and homemade sauces

chain.notes: First 100% vegan planted kebab restaurant chain. All kebab made from pea protein.

locations.name: doen doen Stuttgart
locations.notes: About 20 indoor seats, outdoor seating available

uniqueFeature: 100% vegan kebab chain using only planted.kebab - the first of its kind
